snippet: Congress is ignoring cuts that have already taken place even as it looks for more.
abstract: Editorial warns ill-advised cuts to programs for low-income groups are once again moving to top of Congressional agenda, despite fact that poverty and unemployment remain elevated well into nation's economic recovery; reminds legislators of deep cuts to both food stamps and federal jobless benefits that have already occurred.
lead_paragraph: Congress is ignoring cuts that have already taken place even as it looks for more.

headline.main: Budget Grief for the Poor and Jobless
headline.print_headline: Budget Grief for the Poor and Jobless
